japanese: あー……疲れた……。
translation: Ahh... I'm so tired...

japanese:
私もくたくた……。
こんなに緊張するなんて思わなかったわ。
translation:
I'm exhausted too...
I never thought I'd be this nervous.

japanese:
想像してた結婚式では緊張なんてしてなかったのに。
予想外もいいところよ。
translation:
When I imagined my wedding I didn't feel nervous at all.
That was unexpected.

japanese:
現実なんてそんなもんだ。
なかなか思い通りにいかないさ。
translation:
Reality is something else, though.
Things don't always go as planned.

japanese:
ともかく、なんとか終わったな。
お疲れ二乃。
translation: Anyway, we made it through somehow. Good job, Nino.

japanese: 風太郎もお疲れ様。
translation: You too, Futaro.

japanese:
……思い返してみると、風太郎との恋も
想像していたようなものじゃなかったわね。
translation:
...Looking back, my relationship with you
wasn't exactly what I had imagined.

japanese: はは、だろうな。
translation: Haha, that's probably true.

japanese:
でも、それでよかったのよ。
私らしい恋ができたもの。
translation:
But, that's what made it great.
I loved you in my own unique way.

japanese:
なんでも予想通りなんてつまらない。
型にはまらない恋愛が私たち。
translation:
Predictability is boring.
We had an unconventional romance.

japanese: ね、そう思わない？
translation: Hey, don't you think so?

japanese:
ああ。
お前はいつだって予想を超えることを
しでかしてくれたし。
translation:
Yeah.
You always managed to exceed my expectations.

japanese:
風太郎もよ。
お互い様でしょ。
translation: Same goes for you, Futaro.

japanese: （お互い様、か）
translation: (An unconventional romance, huh?)

japanese:
（俺は二乃を驚かすような真似をした覚えはないが、
　こいつはいつだって俺に教えてくれた）
translation:
(I don't remember doing anything
 that surprised Nino, but she told me what surprised her.)

japanese:
……なあ。
学園祭でのこと、覚えてるか？
translation:
...Hey.
Do you remember what happened at the school festival?

japanese:
学園祭？
色々あったけど、どれのことかしら。
translation:
The school festival? There were a lot of things.
Which one are you talking about?

japanese: それは……。
translation: Well...

japanese:
お前が俺にしでかしてくれたことって言えば
決まってるだろ。
translation: Obviously, I'm talking about what you did to me.

japanese: あの時の、お前からのキスで――
translation: About our first kiss you initiated%p-2;――

japanese: 俺は目が覚めたのかもしれない。
translation: It opened my eyes and evoked my feelings for you.

japanese:
なにそれ。
それじゃ風太郎がお姫様で私が王子様みたい。
translation:
What's that supposed to mean?
It's like you've become the princess,
and I become the prince.

japanese: けど、そう思うんだから仕方ないだろ？
translation:
I can't change your mind, if that's the way you're going to 
look at it, huh?

japanese:
そうね。
私は黙って座ってキスを待ってるような
お姫様じゃないもの。
translation:
That's right.
I'm not the kind of princess who sits silently
and waits for a kiss.

japanese:
仕方ない王子様を
目覚めさせるくらいはやってみせるわよ。
translation:
I'll make sure to do enough
to awaken even a helpless prince.

japanese:
二乃……。
ありがとな、本当にお前がいてくれて良かった。
translation:
Nino...
Thank you. I'm truly glad you're with me.

japanese:
……私こそ。
風太郎に出会えて、良かった。
translation:
...No, it's me who should be saying that.
I'm glad I met you, Futaro.

japanese: 入るぞ、風太郎。
translation: I'm coming in, Futaro.

japanese: ああ、いいぞ。
translation: Yeah, okay.

japanese:
お疲れ。
本当にいい式だった。
translation:
Good one.
It was truly a wonderful ceremony.

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、二乃さん、お疲れさま。
すっごく素敵だったよ。
translation:
Big bro, Nino-san, great job.
It was incredibly beautiful.

japanese: お父さん、らいはちゃん。
translation: My new father-in-law and my new little sister Raiha-chan.

japanese:
改めて、これから上杉家の一員として、
よろしくお願いします。
translation:
Once again from this moment onwards, as a member of the 
Uesugi family, I'll ask for your support.

japanese: こっちこそ、よろしく頼むな。
translation: Likewise. I'm countin' on you.

japanese:
よろしくお願いします。
あと、お兄ちゃんのこともよろしくお願いします。
translation: Please take care of big bro as well.

japanese: ええ、風太郎のことは任せて。
translation: Yes, leave Futaro to me.

japanese: しっかり尻に敷いてくれていいからな！
translation: Make sure you keep that boy in line, now!

japanese: 親父……。
translation: Dad...

japanese:
お父さん。
貸してくださったお店なんですが、
三玖に任せることになりました。
translation:
Dad.
About the shop you lent us.
I've decided to leave it to Miku.

japanese: 中途半端な形になってしまって、すみません。
translation:
I apologize for it
becoming a half-hearted arrangement.

japanese:
気にすんな。
二乃ちゃんには二乃ちゃんの
進むべき道ってのがあるんだからな。
translation:
Don't sweat it.
You got your own path to follow, Nino-chan.

japanese: ありがとうございます。
translation: Thank you very much.

japanese:
私も、いま以上にお店の手伝いをするつもりだから。
安心してお兄ちゃんのところへ行ってね。
translation:
I also intend to help out at the shop
even more from now on.
Please go to my big bro's place with peace of mind.

japanese:
ええ。
三玖のこと、よろしくね。
translation:
Okay.
Take care of Miku for me.

japanese: それはそうと――
translation: By the way%p-2;――

japanese:
風太郎！
マルオもお前のことを認めてくれたようだな。
良かったじゃねーか。
translation:
Futaro!
It seems even Maruo has admitted you as his son-in-law.
That's great, isn't it?

japanese: はっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese: お父さんが風太郎を？
translation: Daddy admitted Futaro?

japanese: 親父、聞いてたのか。
translation: You heard about that, old man?

japanese: たまたま聞こえちまったんだ。
translation: Just happened to overhear it.

japanese: ……まだまだ、これからが本番だ。
translation: We still have a long way to go.

japanese:
この喜びを毎日積み重ねていってこそ、
お父さんに認めてもらえる。
それまでは精進する。
translation:
We have to live joyfully everyday 
to earn your Dad's recognition for sure.
Until then, we'll have to give it our best shot.

japanese: 風太郎……。
translation: Futaro...

japanese:
ふっ……。
我が息子ながら良い男になりやがったな。
translation:
Heh...
You've become a very fine man, my son.

japanese:
ま、俺の次にだが！
ガハハハ！
translation:
But I'll always be better than you!
Gahaha!

japanese: もう、お父さん。
translation: Dad, stop.

japanese:
私、お兄ちゃんのスーツを取りに来たんだ。
返してくるから。
translation:
I came to get your suit, big bro.
Give it back to me and I'll return it.

japanese: サンキュー、らいは。
translation: Thanks, Raiha.

japanese: じゃあ、また後でな！
translation: See you later, then!

japanese:
……ねえ。
お父さん、風太郎になんて言ってたの？
translation:
...Hey.
What did Daddy say to you, Futaro?

japanese:
あー……。
一言では言いづらいんだが。
translation:
Ah...
It's hard to put it into words.

japanese:
お父さんは、娘のお前が
幸せであることを心から祈ってる。
translation: Your father wants you to be happy.

japanese: って、そんなのわかってるよな。
translation: But, you know that, of course.

japanese: ……ええ。
translation: ...Yeah.

japanese:
ごめん、やっぱり言わなくていいわ。
きっとお父さんと風太郎の間だけに
しまっておくべきことなのよね。
translation:
Sorry, maybe I shouldn't have asked. It's probably something 
that should be kept between Dad and Futaro.

japanese:
でも大丈夫かしら？
風太郎、緊張しすぎで誓いのキスを
失敗しそうだったじゃない？
translation:
Wait a sec! Is it really ok?
Futaro seemed so nervous
that he almost messed up the kiss during the vow.

japanese:
そんな様子を見て、
お父さん、幻滅してないといいけど。
translation: I hope Dad wasn't disappointed by that.

japanese:
あ、あれは仕方ねーだろ！
みんな見てるし……。
translation:
Th-that couldn't be helped, you know!
Everyone was watching...

japanese: それに、俺にとっちゃ最終試験だったわけだしな。
translation: Besides, for me, it was like a final exam.

japanese:
ふふっ！
それ、ずーっと気にしてたのね。
translation:
Teehee!
You were worried about that all along.

japanese:
言ったでしょ？
私の採点は厳しいって。
translation: I told you, my grading is strict.

japanese:
だからって、まさか今日まで満点が取れねぇとは
思わなかったんだよ。
translation:
Even so, I had no idea that I wouldn't receive a perfect score 
up to today.

japanese: それで、どうだったんだ？
translation: Anyway, how was it?

japanese: あんな緊張しすぎのキスを採点されていいのかしら？
translation:
Do you really want to be rated based on such a nervously 
performed kiss?

japanese: 緊張はしてたが――俺にとっては特別だ。
translation: I was nervous, but%p-2;――%p; it was special to me.

japanese:
お前とこれから毎日、
喜びを積み重ねていくという誓いなんだから。
translation:
You know what? I vow that, everyday from now on,
we'll be living a happy life together.

japanese: ……私も。
translation: I double that.

japanese:
なにがあっても風太郎と共に生きていく。
その誓いなんだもの。
translation:
No matter what happens,
I'll live my life with you, Futaro.
That's my vow.

japanese: だから、もちろん――
translation: So, of course%p-2;――
